terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.app
Class DoubleFrame

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.app.DoubleFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class DoubleFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame

Standard test frame containing an AppWorld and two AppViews and their displays.

To use this frame...

  • Get the world with getWorld() and add some visible objects to its scene root.
  • Get the views with getViewLeft() and getViewRight() and add them to the world's view root.
  • Use showFrame() when everything is ready to be shown.

See Also:
Serialized Form
